item.description:
This is our first of many planned fly-out events of the year. We've never had a fly-in to Chatham and I thought it would be a great place to go. We could meet in front of the terminal building at (KFIT) and fly out as a group and enjoy breakfast at The Flying Ace Cafe. The restaurant is located right on the field and they are open Sundays until noon.

Why not join your group for a fun flight and great meal. Wheels up by 8:30. As always the more the merrier. So bring along your spouse or friend to join you. This should be a very scenic trip! Don't forget your camera!


http://www.airnav.com...

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Chatham, MA (KCQX)
